data.name: heart
data.title: I love
data.content:
♥ to infinitly learn and strive for the best approach for any project, big or small.
♥ to work on experimental or complex projects.
♥ art and non-commercial projects.
♥ vanilla javascript, Vue/Nuxt and (headless) Wordpress.
♥ full stack coding, design, 3D and animation.

data.name: contact
data.title: Let's talk
data.content: Hi, you can reach me at martijn@orgonemedia.nl

data.name: devices
data.title: What I do
data.content:
I'm a full stack web developer, delivering rock solid code on any device and screen.

I excel in project management with 15 years of game development under my belt. But mostly, I love to create.

You can find me on GitHub, Stack Overflow and LinkedIn.

data.name: refresh
data.title: Refresh our view on life
data.content:
Thank you all contributors of Unsplash for providing amazing photos to my website.
Use the (i) icon to see the background image credits and source.

data.name: merits
data.title: Highlighted projects
data.content:
» UPCOMING «
Developing a web app with Augmented Reality (AR) for a film project, using the mobile phone browser to display short films over framed prints in an expo.

› Dood Paard
Dood Paard is a famous theatre collective based in Amsterdam. A web app made with Vue/Nuxt and headless Wordpress.

» ARCHITECTURE «
A minimalistic web app for Neutelings Riedijk Architects made with Vue/Nuxt and headless Wordpress.
A revamp of VenhoevenCS's website based on Wordpress.

› Wikkelhouse
Wikkelhouse develops and manufactures a unique tiny house, brought by the people from Fiction Factory. The website is based on Wordpress and for their factories in Amsterdam and Chili I developed an internal Vue based tool to standardize each step of the production process.

› HERRI
An e-magazine platform in cooperation with the Africa Open Institute and many other contributors. Made with a custom headless Wordpress and Vue/Nuxt pre-rendered front end.

› Vriend & Vijand In de Klas
An online educational platform used by schools to spark discussion among students about sensitive topics. In the classroom, students connect with their mobile to the website to enable live anonymous polling while the video is playing various scenes, influenced by the votes. Made with node.js server and client side and uses a custom headless Wordpress to setup different videos, questions and polling types. In cooperation with Critical Mass and Studio Parkers.

› Art Up Your Tab – browser extension
Art Up Your Tab is a browser extension for Chrome and Firefox. On a new tab or window it's showing a random painting or photograph from the rich collection of Europeana. In cooperation with Studio Parkers, Europeana, DEN and Kennisland. Made with a custom headless Wordpress and vanilla javascript browser extension code.

› 4Free Now
An education platform to spark discussion in schools around the topic of freedom, in cooperation with Studio Parkers and the The National Committee for 4 and 5 May (liberation day). Contains various mini games including a module with which students use their mobile phone to cast votes on various statements. Made with Wordpress and Javascript.

› Future Cities
A World Press Photo award winning web documentary by Stephanie Bakker and Yvonne Brandwijk, in cooperation with Studio Parkers. Made with Wordpress and Javascript.

› Centric – Digital Services
An interactive presentation of Centric's digital services, in cooperation with NewMade. Made with jQuery

› Het Gezicht van Amsterdam
An interactive neighborhood project, portraying 1018 people that live in the same postcode 1018 in Amsterdam. In cooperation with photographer Maria Heijdendael and WSTNDRP. Made with Wordpress and Javascript.

And many many more along the years...
